Text: how to put cover image to your torrent ??? give me a tutorial pls :D

Go to bayimg and upload the image you want to use. You'll get a link for the image, with letters at the end (e.g. kanImaadB). Copy the letters and modify them all to lowercase (e.g. kanimaadb). Now when you upload a torrent, put the lowercase letters where it says "Image tag from bayimg". The torrent will then display the image you uploaded.
the game starts but the screen goes black on win7
Tested and working fine for me on Windows 7 x64 Home Premium, check GOG forums for help.
